title: A timeline of events in Upper Big Branch mine disaster which killed 29 men
content:
A timeline of events in Upper Big Branch mine disaster, which killed 29 men 

Star Tribune Sunday 27th September, 2015 

CHARLESTON, W.Va. -- Former Massey Energy CEO Don Blankenship heads to trial Thursday on numerous counts of conspiracy and lying to federal financial regulators. He's the highest-ranking executive charged in the April 2010 underground explosion that killed 29 men at the Upper Big Branch Mine in Montcoal, West Virginia. 

Four investigations into the disaster found that worn and broken cutting equipment created a spark that ignited accumulations of coal dust and methane gas. Broken and clogged water sprayers allowed what should have been a minor flare-up to become an inferno.
